sentence.text: Recent studies indicate that such scarring has a high female propensity; females are also almost exclusively affected by endometriosis, a common negative regulation of cell adhesion steroid-dependent fibrotic disease.

In response to surgical induction of endometriosis, regulation of transcription involved in G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle-/- female apoptotic process develop significant fibrosis in contrast to wild-type mice.

entity.text: regulation of transcription involved in G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
